pr_title: Fixing checkstyle issues in cosmos package

timeline.message:
Fixing checkstyle issues in cosmos package
Added suppressions for checks that are not handled at the moment
Addressing #8681 https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/issues/8681
Enabling failsOnError and failOnViolation on cosmos pom
Adding basic javadoc at places, this has to be redone with proper docs

Fixing failing test (added getters for fields that are demoted from public to package private)
Grouping similar checkstyle suppressions as per PR comments.

timeline.bodyText: Please verify that after moving these field(which doesn't have a explicit serializer)from public to default are still coming in diagnostic ,I think  we need to do it manually as all field level validationa not their in tests , please refer CosmosResponseDIagnoticsTest file
timeline.author: simplynaveen20

replies.bodyText:
very good point. also as this PR adds getters to the classes in ClientSideRequestStatistics, jackson may see to ways to get a feild, the field itself and the getter for the field.
We should ensure they are properly annotated as per jackson guideline if one need to be ignored and the other one be used. etc.
replies.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText: Please verify that after moving these field(which doesn't have a explicit serializer)from public to default to after are still coming in diagnostic ,I think we need to do it manually as all field level validation is not their in tests , please refer CosmosResponseDIagnoticsTest file
timeline.author: simplynaveen20
